thread.section_title: L & M Carpet One Floor & Home Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of L & M Carpet One Floor & Home | www.landmcarpetonemechanicsville.com
thread.title: Bucky Shope
thread.title_full: L & M Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Bucky Shope

author: Bucky Shope
title: Bucky Shope
text: After major flooding in our house, we had enough with contractors, what was suppose to be a 4 week remodel of our master bath turned into a 3 month repairs from our second floor all the way through the basement. Laurel Stegman from L&M Carpet One could not have been more helpful. She worked tirelessly with my wife and they installed all the carpet in our house in less then 2 days. The installers were outstanding both for the carpet and vinyl installation. Laurel has a passion for her job and desire to make sure the customer is happy.
